description:
I met Andy on the same trip that I met Dean. Andy was uncertain about doing a video, but after chatting with me for a while, he decided to go ahead and do it.
Andy is a soccer player so he's got nice legs. He told me he's studying political science at the local university. He's also very clean cut and quiet, so he doesn't say much. My questions about sex at the beginning of the video seemed to embarrass him but after he was naked he didn't waste any time blowing a hot load all over his leg.
title: Andy
